alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:43PM CDT until July 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BEAVER...LIPSCOMB...NORTHERN WHEELER AND HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 743 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Follett to Lake Marvin to near Wheeler, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Canadian, Briscoe, Wheeler, Booker, Follett, Higgins, Darrouzett, Elmwood, New Mobeetie, Allison, Glazier, Lake Marvin, Slapout and Mobeetie. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
